#id=1
#text=Today I wanted to take a ride on my bicycle but could n't because it had a flat tire .
#id=2
#text=So I loaded my bicycle up into my car and took it to the bike shop to be repaired .
#id=3
#text=The man that worked at the shop put my bicycle upside down on a rack that held it in place .
#id=4
#text=He removed the tire from the rim .
#id=5
#text=The rim is the silver part that makes the tire go around .
#id=6
#text=He then removed a rubber tube from inside the tire and replaced it with a new tube .
#id=7
#text=Next the man put the tire back onto my bike .
#id=8
#text=He then took my bike down off of the rack and added air to the tire to pump it up .
#id=9
#text=He had me sit on the bike to make sure the correct amount of air was in the tire .
#text=It was perfect and I was ready to ride !
